completed_projects.description: Add plan file status verification to /implement GATE OUT checkpoint and make implementation skills more explicit about plan file updates. completed_projects.completion_summary: Updated Claude Code statusline hook script to use Unicode block characters (█░) instead of ASCII bracket notation ([=][-]) for the progress bar. The display now shows clean progress bars like '50% █████░░░░░ 100k/200k' instead of cluttered '50% [[=][=][=][=][=][-][-][-][-][-]] 100k/200k'.
